website_summaries.verdict: This Bulova earns praise for its eye-catching looks and unique design; but it's not the best choice if you are looking for a watch to wear for every day activities or those that may expose it to excessive moisture.
pros: Features handsome contrasting colors, as it has rose gold-tone finish with a black face and sturdy rubber strap
Roman numerals and chronograph design add to its classy looks
Ideal for dressy or formal wear
cons: Though rated to be water resistant up to 330 feet, some owners report the crystal fogged when exposed to moisture

customer_reviews.title: My first Bulova. Won't be my last. No ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Bulova. Won't be my last. No complaints. One thing worth noting is the rose gold part of the watch is shiny not matte as shown in the pics. If you're set on matte don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal on a Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. The reviews were all pretty positive so I crossed my fingers and waited. When the watch arrived I loved it even more in person as I did online. It looks like a MUCH more expensive watch and has so many nice details including a large face and substantial weight. The rubber watch band is thick and high quality. I was worried it would have a "fitbit" feel to it, but to the contrary, it makes this watch the perfect combination dressy/casual. My husband loved it as well and it looks great on him. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: LJarvis

customer_reviews.title: Used...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not appear new The box was worn with discolored white rubbed off edges and the watch was already unsealed. The plastic clip under the dial had already been removed and the clock hands were in motion. I'm positive the battery will need to be replaced early. There was no plastic over the face of the watch for scratch perfection. Thus should have been sold as unboxed or used not new. I was very disappointed that this was sold by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kem B

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. Classy , fits perfectly , and looks simple and elegant . Very happy .
customer_reviews.author: Jason Snell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but BAD quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a present. This is the most beautiful watch and he got many compliments BUT it stopped working properly after about a year. I replaced the battery, it worked for 2 months then stopped working again. Replaced another battery and it worked for a few more weeks and died. When it does work, it does not show the correct time - it is hours behind. Basically a lovely piece of jewelry but definitely not for time-telling. SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Intelligent Reader

customer_reviews.title: Prefect price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift. The style is sexy and I love the material. It was perfect for me because of the rubber band didn’t bother me like metal bands do. The price was perfect for the style and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Stunning Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. The Zales one was too expensive @ $500 so I got this one and OMG I love it and he loves it! The quality is amazing and it’s just a gorgeous and stunning watch! Couldn’t be more happier with this purchase! I’ll update once he’s been using it for a while. But he was blown away by it! Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the watch at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the watch at a price and mark of excellence. The clock can be used from a formal event to an informal occasion. The finish of the watch case is spectacular, combining a shine and brushing, with the screws in the bezel of the same color of the box. Giving, that touch of elegance and distinction that any man would be proud to wear on any occasion
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the watch face, I honestly didn't care too much for the silicone wrist straps but I really love them now, it feels so much better than some of my leather straps on my other watches
customer_reviews.author: JTF

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best watch. I bought this for my boyfriend for ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best watch. I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. Shipping was on time and it looks amazing.. Not a scratch! The only worry I had was it may not be big enough for my boyfriends wrist since me has big hands and wrist but it turned out to be a perfect fit. Every time he wears it I see his confidence go through the roof :) the first time I surprised him with it he could stop thanking me and staring at it. Great present for yourself or your man. Either way great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Hft

customer_reviews.title: and this by far is my favorite watch. A lot nicer in person and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have over 20 watches from all different kinds of brands, and this by far is my favorite watch. A lot nicer in person and I love the band as well has a soft velvet feel to it. It's so nice i'm considering wearing this watch on my wedding day coming up in a few months as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch because I wanted something other than silver or black. Immediately got compliments because of how the color shines right off the timepiece and how elegant it looks on the wrist. I do have to give caution to people who do not have large wrists because this is a decent sized watch. Also it is on the heavier side of watches, but it will definitely not become a deterring factor in wearing it. If you're on the fence about buying it, I would do it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Evan Seidling

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Marine Star!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was simple - much easier than with other watch sites, such as Nextdaywatches.com. And the watch was actually in-stock, as advertised. It arrived quickly, in perfect condition. The watch is large, but not so large as to be gaudy, painful to wear, or difficult to wear with certain clothing. It is a snap to set up. The rubber strap is silky smooth and very comfortable - feels like a silicone rubber (which it may in fact be - I don't know). The case and face are very handsome, and look to be far more expensive than the actual cost. Easily can were with blacks or browns. An awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Myers

customer_reviews.title: Watch every guy needs
customer_reviews.text: This is the watch you want !! Bang for the buck looks like couple thousands $$ Watch getting great compliments. Women love it too.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful watch

customer_reviews.title: Best watch I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I bought this watch that it was going to be a big piece, I had seen it on display at a store at a retail price for over 400 dollars, got mine on this site for just a little over 230 and when I got mine and tried it on I realized that this is a lot of watch! Now don't get me wrong I'm over six feet tall so this watch doesn't look too big for my arm but it's the biggest one I own, the heaviest too, but I love it, it can be confused easily with a Bvlgari or another much more expensive brand
customer_reviews.author: R. Sayans

customer_reviews.title: Timely Delivery, Great product.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerced for its authenticity. The watch is original, arrived well and haven't had problems so far. I read other reviews before purchasing this watch which warned about the Roman Numeral markers falling off. I have not had that problem yet. Although, I have not used the watch as often as I wish, it seems that the problem is a manufacture defect. I'm enjoying the watch so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan F

customer_reviews.title: Quality and classy watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased. Everyone keeps looking at my wrist every time I move my hand. It goes well for any occasion. Ladies, if you need a gift for you guy, this is the one that he will appreciate along with cologne.

But really a great looking watch.

It is so elegant and sporty at the same time. Seems like it's worth $1000. I loved it so much that I bought another Bulova for my dad. I had already recommended this all my friends and family!

customer_reviews.title: Bulova wristwatch
customer_reviews.text: The Marine Star model wristwatch lives up to Bulova's history and rock solid reputation. Good looking, masculine and eye catching with coppertone highlights on a black dial. Bit heavy, but knew I'd get used to it. Would buy again from The Watch Co. Absolutely the lowest price anywhere and wicked fast shipping. A 66th pre-Father's Day gift to myself. Live your dreams NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Marine Star

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I tried this watch on @ Macy's the other day and thought it was the perfect watch for a guy like me (6'2 240 lbs). My GF found it here for 40% off the retail price and ordered it for my B-day. She asked me to check the status of the order and I noticed that the watch went from $252 to $222. Since the watch hadn't been delivered yet I decided to call Amazon and see if they would credit the difference. My customer service rep didn't hesitate to do so. No hassle, just a simple "you bet we can!" Def made my day. We shop here often and will keep doing so in the future!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jarmula

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AMAZING!!!!!!! GO FOR IT!!!!!

(09/02/14), I showed the sells person and her eyebrows went up she said the lowest she can do for me after signing up with their credit card was 303.00! So I saved almost 100.00!, this purchase is a no brainer! 04/13/2015 Watch is still awsome and lots of compliments on daily basis the only thing I have done to it was changing the glass cover witch was expensive $52.00 because I use it everyday at work and it was all scratched, definitely not scratch resistant lol overall worth every penny

Although it is heavy-in comparison with other watches- it is a men's watch..... so i believe that any man can handle it's weight.The black and pink gold combination matches perfect with the whole watch and whoever saw my watch was really impressed and especially my girlfriend......

Conclusion: Is a very nice watch for use in any ocassion, it feels comfortable, looks elegant and expensive than it costs

Black cheap looking plastic.

Beautiful chamfered edges and I get tons of compliments. Looks a lot like the Cartier de Calibre. The rubber strap is very thick with a nice tactile matte finish. Even the buckle is gold with the Bulova logo. One of my favorite watches.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent watch was exactly what I wanted, arrived on time, excellent quality, good investment for a watch, I recommend it openly
customer_reviews.author: gabriel emilio alvarez VE7X29820N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: Even better than my expectations. It came with the bulova fork instead of the number twelve which was my only concern at the time of purchase because I wanted that and the picture didn't show it. I recommend this watch
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Andres Chamba Gomez

product_meta.title: Bulova Mens Marine Star - 98B104
product_meta.description:
* Bulova Marine Star 
 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * The sporty 98B104 marries function with elegance without sacrificing any of its signature Bulova style.
 * Stainless steel case.
 * Rubber strap with adjustable buckle closure.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Dial features Roman numeral hour markers.
 * Dimensions:
   Face Width 42mm
   Face Height 42mm
   Face Depth 13mm
   Band Width 22mm
   Band Circumference 8.25 inches
 * Your Bulova watch is covered by Bulova's 3-Year Global Warranty.

feature_bullets: Rose gold-tone watch featuring black guilloche dial with three chronograph subdials and rose gold-tone hands/Roman numeral indices
44 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window. Clean and oil the watch periodically to ensure optimum performance
Japanese quartz movement with analog display

Rubber band with deployment clasp and push-button closure. Do not make this day/date adjustment when the time on the watch indicates between 9 P .M. and 4 A.M. as it will become incorrect due to the engagement of the changing mechanism
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
